name: part_007
file: tmp_[Official] 3D Anime ＂Magical Girl holoWitches! THE STAGE ~TRICK or MAGIC!~＂ Main Story [_qpO8vi9fpA]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: The holoWitches members thank the audience and talk about their Halloween memories during the MC segment.
The group performs the song 'Hajimari no Mahou -charm-'.

subtitles.original: みんな、今日はありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for today!

subtitles.original: 最高に楽しいハロウィンだったよね？みんな！
subtitles.english: It was the most fun Halloween, wasn't it? Everyone!

subtitles.original: ちょっとアクシデントもあったけどさ
subtitles.english: There were a few accidents, but...

subtitles.original: そう言うのも含めて
subtitles.english: including all of that,

subtitles.original: いい思い出になったんじゃない？
subtitles.english: didn't it make for a good memory?

subtitles.original: だねー！
subtitles.english: Totally!

subtitles.original: いい思い出…
subtitles.english: A good memory...

subtitles.original: おい！
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: さて、そろそろお時間となって参りましたが
subtitles.english: Well then, it is almost time to wrap up...

subtitles.original: アンコール！
subtitles.english: Encore!

subtitles.original: アンコール！
subtitles.english: Encore!

subtitles.original: それじゃあアンコールにお応えして！
subtitles.english: Then, in answer to your encore!

subtitles.original: この曲、歌っちゃうのら！
subtitles.english: We're gonna sing this song, nora!

subtitles.original: はじまりの魔法 -charm-！
subtitles.english: Hajimari no Mahou -charm-!

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ
subtitles.english: I'll cast a magic spell on you,

subtitles.original: 見返せるおまじない
subtitles.english: a charm to prove them all wrong.

subtitles.original: 始まりを告げる衝動が響く
subtitles.english: The impulse signaling the beginning resounds.

subtitles.original: 気付いた時がいつだってスタートラインなんだ
subtitles.english: Whenever you realize it, that is your start line.

subtitles.original: 何者でもなかった日々を超えたのは
subtitles.english: What surpassed the days when I was nobody,

subtitles.original: 見つけたばかりのちっぽけな輝きの原石
subtitles.english: was the tiny unpolished gem of radiance I just found.

subtitles.original: どうして私だけ上手くいかないんだろう
subtitles.english: Why am I the only one who can't do things well?

subtitles.original: 自分以外の全てが眩しく見えるけど
subtitles.english: Everything other than myself looks so dazzling, but...

subtitles.original: ねえ君に見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: Hey, I wanted you to find me.

subtitles.original: なりたい私になる今こそ
subtitles.english: I'll become the 'me' I want to be, right now.

subtitles.original: そうだ 叶えたい掴みたい夢があるから
subtitles.english: That's right, because I have a dream I want to fulfill and seize.

subtitles.original: 塞ぎ込んだ昨日ごとも連れて行くんだ
subtitles.english: I'll take even my depressed yesterdays along with me.

subtitles.original: 信じる力が奇跡を起こすように
subtitles.english: So that the power of believing creates a miracle.

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ
subtitles.english: I'll cast a magic spell on you,

subtitles.original: 見返せるおまじない
subtitles.english: a charm to prove them all wrong.

subtitles.original: 叶わぬ望みと
subtitles.english: Unfulfillable hopes,

subtitles.original: 叶わない願い
subtitles.english: and unfulfillable wishes,

subtitles.original: それぞれが等しく流れてく世界で
subtitles.english: in a world where they all flow equally...

subtitles.original: 何を求めて歩き続けるんだろう
subtitles.english: what are we seeking as we keep walking?

subtitles.original: いつでもこの場所で迷うけど
subtitles.english: I always get lost in this place, but...

subtitles.original: 君がくれたこの空が
subtitles.english: this sky that you gave me,

subtitles.original: 見えない翼をくれたね
subtitles.english: gave me invisible wings, didn't it?

subtitles.original: そうだ 照らしたい届けたい人がいるから
subtitles.english: That's right, because there are people I want to shine on and reach.

subtitles.original: たとえ一人置いてけぼり食らうと怯えてたんだ
subtitles.english: Even if I was frightened of being left behind all alone...

subtitles.original: 愛したい応えたい自分自身の期待
subtitles.english: I want to love, I want to answer my own expectations.

subtitles.original: 正解なんて超えて行こう 未体験の先へ
subtitles.english: Let's go beyond the 'correct answer', to the unexperienced future.

subtitles.original: どんな場所でもいいよ
subtitles.english: Any place is fine.

subtitles.original: どんな姿でもいい
subtitles.english: Any form is fine.

subtitles.original: 追いかけたいんだ あの煌めきを
subtitles.english: I want to chase after that sparkle.

subtitles.original: 希望 野望 光 痛み 力 全て抱きしめて持って行こう
subtitles.english: Hope, ambition, light, pain, power; hold them all close and let's go.

subtitles.original: ほら 繋げたい広げたい道があるから
subtitles.english: Look, because there's a path I want to connect and expand.

subtitles.original: ここから始まる物語を一緒に
subtitles.english: The story starting from here, together we'll...
